title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 81.1 - Purpose of regulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 81.1 - Purpose of regulation

State Regulations

The purpose of this regulation is to prescribe the source
documents and methods of calculation to be used by the Office of the State

Comptroller in computing the amounts of general purpose State aid for the
support of local government for the 1986-87 State fiscal year pursuant to
section
54
of the

State Finance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
81.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
